body: Hmm... How could I summarize the story : let’s place Captain Oblivious and his girlfriend in a situation likely to trigger netorare. The Captain will manage not to notice anything, because, duh, he’s Captain Oblivious and he’s got thick enough plot armor. But his girlfriend will still hyperfuck everyone in the train while feeling guilty about doing it behind his back.
I started to kinda like this artist's drawing, but then a ntr appears, lol, so much for started to like this artist.
